aboutMe.name: John Doe
aboutMe.title: Full-Stack Developer
bio: A programmer with a passion for coding and problem-solving. Hi, my name is Akshay, my focus is on creating accessible tech products that impacts people beyond social and economic barrier.

I am a self-taught developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript, ReactJs, and NextJs. I am proficient in working with modern AI tools and technologies to build scalable and efficient web applications that provides real-world solutions.
I specialise in creating AI-driven voice & chat interface, and software as a service (SaaS) applications.

now.cta: And I work as a freelance developer for startups to create customised AI & SaaS products.

workExperience.title: Tech Lead
responsibilities: I lead the team to engineer & create an AI Agent for improving Meta & Google ad performance ROI for businesses.
Collaborated with designers to create pixel-perfect UI.
Helped the founding team to test Beta version for initial few customers, now creating a full-stack app for same.

workExperience.title: AI Agents Developer
responsibilities: I create customised AI voice interfaces & chatbots, leveraging advanced AI tools and workflow automations for seamless user experiences.
I design, develop, and deploy scalable solutions tailored to client needs.

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: I specialise in creating Software as a Service (SaaS) applications, I build engaging, responsive web apps using modern frameworks like Next.js.
I like to create high-performance, accessible web applications that meet diverse project goals.

projects.title: Interaktive AI Solutions
projects.description: Customised AI Sales Agent to help businesses make higher ROI on Meta & Google ad campaigns.

projects.title: ARX
projects.description: B2B marketplace for jewellery manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers in India.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A full-stack task management tool with user authentication and real-time updates.

projects.title: AI Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot for customer support.
